page-title: Request songs, chat in separate chat rooms and participate in polls!
intro: The goal of this platform is to make online music performances more enjoyable and provide more ways to interact between artists and viewers.
song-requests-p1: During shows you can request songs. Other participants can vote on your song request, this way the artist knows which songs the audience wants to hear the most.
chat-p1: You can create your own chat rooms, this way you can discuss the show together with your friends.
polls-p1: Artists can create polls for you to vote on. This way there is even more interaction between participants and artists.
